Fadlan dooro:

employer_tip_write_effective_job_descrip: Qor sharraxaadyo shaqo oo cad oo leh mas'uuliyado iyo shuruudo muhiim ah si aad u soo jiidato musharraxiin wanaagsan.
employer_tip_improve_employer_brand: Ku soo bandhig dhaqanka shirkaddaada xayeysiisyada shaqada si aad u soo jiidato musharraxiin ku habboon qiyamkaaga.
employer_tip_streamline_hire_process: Yaree wakhtiga shaqaalaynta adigoo dejinaya jadwal cad marxalad kasta oo shaqaalaynta ah.
employer_tip_diversity_hiring: Tixgeli farsamooyinka shaqaalaynta indha la'aanta si loo yareeyo eexda miyir la'aanta ee shaqaalaynta.
employer_tip_candidate_experience: Ka jawaab dhammaan codsadayaasha, xitaa kuwa la diiday, si loo ilaaliyo sumcadda shaqaaleeye ee wanaagsan.
employer_tip_effective_interview_techniq: Isticmaal wareysiyo habaysan oo leh su'aalo joogto ah si loo qiimeeyo musharraxiinta si cadaalad ah.
employer_tip_retention_strategies: Ku shaqaalee dadka ku habboon dhaqanka shirkadda iyo xirfadaha si loo hagaajiyo haysashada shaqaalaha.
employer_tip_market_trends: Baadh heerarka mushaharka ka hor intaadan dhajin jagooyin cusub.
employer_tip_ai_in_recruiting: Isticmaal qalabka AI si aad si hufan u shaandhayso CV-yada adigoo ilaalinaya kormeerka aadanaha.
employer_tip_employee_referral_programs: Hirgeli barnaamijka tixraaca shaqaalaha si aad uga faa'iidaysato shabakadaha kooxdaada.
review_new_applications_prompt: Dib u eeg codsiyadaada cusub maanta si aad uga fogaato inaad seegto musharraxiinta ugu sarreeya!
post_first_vacancy_prompt: Dhajiso jagadaada ugu horreysa si aad u bilowdo soo jiidashada musharraxiin u qalma!
complete_profile_prompt: Buuxi profile-kaaga si aad ugu muuqato mid xirfad leh musharraxiinta hortooda
profile_complete_tip: Wanaagsan! Profile-kaaga oo dhameystiran wuxuu kaa caawinayaa soo jiidashada hibada sare.
profile_almost_complete_tip: Halkaas ayaad ku dhowdahay! Buuxi profile-kaaga si aad u kordhiso muuqashadaada.
profile_half_complete_tip: Bilow fiican! Profile-ka oo dhammaystiran wuxuu helaa 3 jeer codsiyo badan.
profile_beginner_tip: Talo: Buuxi profile-kaaga si aad ugu muuqato mid xirfad leh musharraxiinta hortooda.
stats_improvement_tip: Jawaabaha degdega ah waxay hagaajiyaan khibradda musharraxa iyo heerarka shaqaalaynta.
can_only_renew_expired: Jagooyinka dhacay oo keliya ayaa la cusbooneysiin karaa.
faq_section: Qaybta Su'aalaha Inta Badan La Weydiiyo (FAQ)
faq_intro: Ku soo dhawoow qaybta FAQ! Halkan, waxaad ka heli kartaa jawaabaha su'aalaha caadiga ah ee ku saabsan isticmaalka bot-ka.
faq_category_intro: Waa kuwan su'aalaha inta badan la weydiiyo ee ku jira qaybtaan.
choose_faq_question: Dooro su'aal si aad u aragto jawaabteeda.
faq_profile_completion: Sidee loo xisaabiyaa boqolleyda dhammaystirka profile-kayga?
faq_profile_completion_answer: Boqolleyda dhammaystirka profile-kaaga waxaa lagu xisaabiyaa iyadoo lagu salaynayo inta goobood ee loo baahan yahay ee aad buuxisay, sida magaca shirkadda, magaalada, lambarka taleefanka, nooca shaqaaleeye, wax ku saabsan shirkadda, iyo dukumiintiyada xaqiijinta.
faq_profile_strength: Maxay ka dhigan tahay baarka xoogga profile-ka?
faq_profile_strength_answer: Baarka xoogga profile-ka wuxuu si muuqaal ah u metelaa sida profile-kaagu u dhammaystiran yahay. Tusaale ahaan: ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë‚ñë 50%.
faq_edit_profile: Sideen wax uga beddeli karaa profile-ka shirkaddayda?
faq_edit_profile_answer: Laga bilaabo menu-ga ugu weyn, aad qaybta 'Wax ka beddel Profile'. Waxaad cusbooneysiin kartaa goobo sida magaca shirkadda, goobta, lambarka taleefanka, iyo in ka badan.
faq_delete_account_answer: Aad menu-ga profile-ka, dooro 'Tirtir Account-kayga,' oo xaqiiji xulashadaada. Ogsoonow in ficilkan aan dib loo noqon karin.
faq_active_vacancies: Sideen u hubin karaa jagooyinkayga banaan ee firfircoon iyo codsiyada cusub?
faq_active_vacancies_answer: Markaad furto menu-ga ugu weyn, waxaad arki doontaa tirada jagooyinka banaan ee firfircoon iyo codsiyada cusub oo la soo bandhigay. Tusaale ahaan: 'Jagooyin Banaanaan oo Firfircoon: 3 ‚ú®' iyo 'Codsiyo Cusub: 5 üî•'.
faq_post_job: Sideen u dhajin karaa jago shaqo oo cusub?
faq_post_job_answer: Waxaad dhajin kartaa shaqo adigoo dooranaya xulashada 'Dhajiso Jago'. Waxaa laguu hagi doonaa tallaabo-tallaabo si aad u bixiso faahfaahin sida cinwaanka shaqada, nooca shaqada, doorbidka jinsiga, tirada, heerka, sharraxaadda, shuruudaha, xirfadaha, mushaharka, faa'iidooyinka, iyo waqtiga kama dambaysta ah ee codsiga.
faq_manage_vacancies: Miyay suuragal tahay inaan maamulo jagooyinkayga banaan ee firfircoon?
faq_manage_vacancies_answer: Haa, hoosta 'Maamul Jagooyinka Banaan,' waxaad ku arki kartaa dhammaan liisaskaaga shaqo ee firfircoon, kuwa sugaya, kuwa dhacay, iyo kuwa xiran. Waxaad sidoo kale hubin kartaa tirada codsiyada la helay jago kasta iyo inaad fuliso ficillo sida eegista codsadayaasha, xiritaanka shaqada, cusbooneysiinta jago dhacday, ama hubinta tirakoobka.
faq_view_applicants: Sideen u arki karaa codsadayaasha jagooyinkayga banaan?
faq_view_applicants_answer: Haa, hoosta 'Maamul Jagooyinka Banaan,' dooro shaqo firfircoon ama la oggolaaday oo guji 'Eeg Codsadayaasha' si aad u aragto liiska musharraxiinta codsaday.
faq_view_analytics: Noockee falanqayn ah ayaan arki karaa?
faq_view_analytics_answer: Waxaad arki kartaa qiyaaso sida jagooyinka banaan ee firfircoon, wadar ahaan codsiyada, heerka shaqaalaynta, iyo celcelis wakhtiga jawaabta.
faq_export_data: Ma dhoofin karaa xayeysiisyadayda shaqo ama xogta codsiga?
faq_export_data_answer: Haa, waxaad dhoofin kartaa xogtaada qaabka CSV. Isticmaal xulashada 'Dhoofi Xogta' oo ku hoos jirta Falanqaynta ama Qaybta Maareynta Database-ka si aad u soo dejiso warbixinnada.
faq_change_language_answer: Haa, waxaad beddeli kartaa luqadda adigoo dooranaya xulashada 'Beddel Luqadda'. Luqadaha la taageeray waxaa ka mid ah Ingiriis, Amxaari, Oromo, Tigrinya, Afar, iyo Soomaali.
faq_employer_tips: Waa maxay talooyinka shaqaaleeyaha ee maalinta?
faq_employer_tips_answer: Kuwani waa talooyin waxtar leh oo lagu hagaajinayo habkaaga shaqaalaynta. Tusaalooyinka waxaa ka mid ah qorista sharraxaadyo shaqo oo wax ku ool ah, kor u qaadista sumcaddaada shaqaaleeye, iyo isticmaalka AI-ga shaqaalaynta.
faq_renew_vacancy: Sideen u cusbooneysiin karaa jago shaqo oo dhacday?
faq_renew_vacancy_answer: Haa, waxaad cusbooneysiin kartaa jagooyinka banaan ee dhacay. Dooro xulashada 'Cusbooneysii' ee shaqada dhacday oo dooro muddada cusbooneysiinta (tusaale, 30 maalmood, 60 maalmood, ama mid gaar ah). Waqtiga kama dambaysta ah ee cusub ayaa si toos ah loo cusbooneysiin doonaa.
faq_close_job: Ma xidhi karaa jago shaqo ka hor waqtiga kama dambaysta ah?
faq_close_job_answer: Haa, waxaad xidhi kartaa jago shaqo oo firfircoon wakhti kasta adigoo dooranaya xulashada 'Xidh Shaqada' ee ku hoos jirta menu-ga faahfaahinta shaqada. Waxaad u baahan doontaa inaad xaqiijiso ficilka ka hor intaadan sii wadin.
faq_download_cv: Miyay suuragal tahay in la soo dejiyo CV-ga musharrax?
faq_download_cv_answer: Haa, haddii musharraxu soo galiyay CV, waxaad si toos ah uga soo dejisan kartaa bogga faahfaahinta codsigooda adigoo gujinaya badhanka 'Soo Deji CV'.
faq_accept_reject_applicant: Maxaa dhacaya ka dib markaan aqbalo ama diido codsade?
faq_accept_reject_applicant_answer: Aqbal: Musharraxa waa la ogeysiiyaa in la xushay, waxaadna u diri kartaa fariin ikhtiyaari ah. Diid: Waxaa lagu weydiin doonaa inaad bixiso sababta diidmada, taasoo lala wadaagi doono musharraxa.
faq_quick_action_suggestions: Waa maxay talooyinka ficil degdeg ah?
faq_quick_action_suggestions_answer: Kuwani waa talooyin shakhsi ah oo kaa caawinaya inaad qaaddo tallaabooyin degdeg ah, sida dib u eegista codsiyada cusub ama dhajinta jago banaan.
faq_main_menu_options: Waa maxay xulashooyinka laga heli karo Menu-ga Guud ee Shaqaaleeyaha?
faq_main_menu_options_answer: Laga bilaabo Menu-ga Guud ee Shaqaaleeyaha, waxaad awood u leedahay inaad: Aragto oo aad maamusho profile-kaaga (tusaale, wax ka beddel faahfaahinta, hubi dhammaystirka profile-ka), aad dhajiso jagooyin shaqo oo cusub ama aad maamusho kuwa jira, aad aragto falanqaynta ku saabsan waxqabadkaaga shaqaalaynta, oo aad hesho caawimaad iyo talooyin ku saabsan hagaajinta habkaaga shaqaalaynta.
help_intro: Ku soo dhawoow Xarunta Caawimaadda! Halkan, waxaad ka heli kartaa jawaabaha su'aalaha caadiga ah oo aad heli kartaa caawimaad.
tip_portfolio: Talo: Portfolio xooggan ayaa kordhiya fursadahaaga inaad shaqo hesho.
tip_communication: Talo: Xidhiidhka cad ee lala yeesho macaamiisha wuxuu horseedi karaa natiijooyin mashruuc oo wanaagsan.
tip_profile_completion: Talo: Dhammaystirka profile-kaaga wuxuu kordhiyaa muuqashadaada shaqaaleeyayaasha.
tip_negotiation: Talo: Noqo mid ku kalsoon laakiin dabacsanaan muuji inta lagu jiro gorgortanka mushaharka.
tip_post_job: Talo: Bixi faahfaahin shaqo oo cad si aad u soo jiidato musharraxiin u qalma.
choose_faq_type: Fadlan dooro nooca FAQ-ga aad u baahan tahay:
under_development_message: üöß Qaybtaan waa la hagaajinayaa. Fadlan dib u hubi mar dambe!
select_faq_category: Fadlan dooro qaybta FAQ-ga ee ku habboon doorkaaga:
tip_manage_vacancies: Si joogto ah u cusbooneysii xayeysiisyadaada shaqo si ay u sii ahaadaan kuwo firfircoon
tip_view_analytics: Toddobaadkiiba mar hubi falanqayntaada si aad ula socoto waxqabadka
tip_change_language: Waxaad beddeli kartaa luqadda wakhti kasta goobaha dejinta
js_faq_intro: Ka hel jawaabaha su'aalaha caadiga ah ee ku saabsan raadinta shaqada, codsiyada, iyo maareynta profile-ka.
js_tip_complete_profile: Buuxi dhammaan qaybaha profile-ka si aad u kordhiso muuqashadaada shaqaaleeyayaasha
js_tip_application_strategy: U habee warqadahaada daboolka sharraxaadda shaqo kasta si aad u hesho natiijooyin wanaagsan
js_tip_search_filters: Isticmaal shaandhaynta horumarsan si aad si degdeg ah u hesho shaqooyin ku habboon doorbidkaaga
js_tip_document_upload: Hay CV-gaaga oo cusub oo hubi in linkiga portfolio-gaagu uu shaqeynayo
js_tip_profile_visibility: Si joogto ah u cusbooneysii xirfadaha/waayo-aragnimada si aad u ahaato mid la xiriira
js_faq_registration_steps: Sideen isaga diiwaan gelin karaa shaqo doon ahaan?
js_faq_registration_steps_answer:
Si aad isaga diiwaan geliso:
1. Dooro 'Shaqo Doon' inta lagu jiro diiwaangelinta
2. Bixi taariikhda dhalashada, jinsiga, macluumaadka xiriirka, iyo luqadaha
3. Ikhtiyaar ahaan ku dar aqoon-isweydaarsi, xirfado, waayo-aragnimo, iyo dukumiintiyo
js_faq_profile_update: Ma wax ka beddeli karaa profile-kayga ka dib diiwaangelinta?
js_faq_profile_update_answer: Haa - cusbooneysii macluumaadka xiriirka, xirfadaha, aqoon-isweydaarsiga, iyo dukumiintiyada wakhti kasta adigoo isticmaalaya 'Wax ka beddel Profile'
js_faq_document_upload_answer: Soo geli inta lagu jiro diiwaangelinta/cusbooneysiinta profile-ka, ama bixi linkiga portfolio-ga
js_faq_optional_fields: Ma ka boodi karaa goobaha diiwaangelinta ee ikhtiyaariga ah?
js_faq_optional_fields_answer: Haa, laakiin buuxinta dhammaan goobaha waxay hagaajinaysaa kalsoonida iyo muuqashada profile-ka
js_faq_job_application_process_answer:
1. Guji xayeysiiska shaqada
2. Qor warqad dabool oo ku habboon
3. Ku soo gudbi bot-ka
js_faq_application_status: Sideen u hubin karaa xaaladda codsigayga?
js_faq_application_status_answer: Ku arag dhammaan codsiyada xaaladdooda ('Sugaya'/‚ÄòLa Oggolaaday‚Äô/'La Diiday') 'Codsiyadayda'
js_faq_application_outcome: Maxaa dhacaya ka dib markaan codsado?
js_faq_application_outcome_answer: Waxaad heli doontaa xaqiijin. Haddii lagu xusho, shaqaaleeyuhu wuxuu bixin doonaa tallaabooyinka xiga. Haddii lagu diido, waxaad heli doontaa jawaab celin
js_faq_application_export_answer: Haa - u dhoofi sidii faylka Excel (.xlsx) 'Codsiyadayda'
js_faq_job_search_answer: Isticmaal raadinta ereyga muhiimka ah cinwaannada, xirfadaha, ama warshadaha. Kaydi raadinta si aad u hesho ogeysiisyo
js_faq_advanced_filters: Waa maxay shaandhaynta raadinta ee la heli karo?
js_faq_advanced_filters_answer:
Shaandhee adigoo isticmaalaya:
- Nooca shaqada (Shaqo buuxda/Shaqo qayb ah/Shaqo fog)
- Heerka mushaharka
- Heerka waayo-aragnimada
js_faq_search_sorting: Ma kala saari karaa natiijooyinka raadinta?
js_faq_search_sorting_answer: Kala saar adigoo isticmaalaya: Xayeysiisyada ugu dambeeyay ama shaqooyinka mushaharka ugu sarreeya
js_faq_search_saving_answer: Haa - raadinta la kaydiyay ayaa ku ogeysiin doonta shaqooyinka cusub ee ku habboon
js_faq_account_deletion_answer: Isticmaal 'Tirtir Account-kayga' goobaha dejinta (waa mid joogto ah oo aan dib loo noqon karin)
js_faq_data_visibility_answer: Xakamaynta muuqashadaada shaqaaleeyaha adigoo isticmaalaya goobaha sirta ee maareynta account-ka
js_faq_ban_notification: Maxaa dhacaya haddii la i mamnuuco?
js_faq_ban_notification_answer: Waxaad heli doontaa fariin mamnuucid ah oo leh sababta iyo ikhtiyaarka racfaanka
js_faq_appeal_process: Sideen u racfaan qaadan karaa mamnuucid?
js_faq_appeal_process_answer: Isticmaal badhanka 'üìù Racfaan Mamnuucid' ee ku jira fariinta mamnuucidda si aad u soo gudbiso dacwadaada (ugu badnaan 500 oo xaraf)
js_faq_appeal_review: Maxaa dhacaya ka dib markaan soo gudbiyo racfaan?
js_faq_appeal_review_answer: Maamulayaasha ayaa dib u eegi doona racfaankaaga oo ku ogeysiin doona go'aankooda
js_faq_ban_removal: Ma la qaadi karaa mamnuuciddii la i saaray?
js_faq_ban_removal_answer: Haa, haddii racfaankaagu ku guuleysto mamnuuciddii waa lagaa qaadi doonaa
js_faq_appeal_rejection: Maxaa dhacaya haddii racfaankayga la diido?
js_faq_appeal_rejection_answer: Mamnuuciddii ayaa sii jiraysa iyadoo la bixinayo sharraxaad - xadgudubyada halista ah/soo noqnoqda badanaa way sii mamnuucnaadaan
js_faq_admin_ban_criteria: Sidee maamulayaashu u go'aansadaan inay mamnuucaan isticmaaleyaasha?
js_faq_admin_ban_criteria_answer: Mamnuucidyada waxay dhacaan xadgudubyo sida faafin spam-ka, dhaqan aan habboonayn, ama si khaldan u isticmaalka madal iyadoo la bixinayo sababo cad
js_faq_ban_reason_visibility: Miyaan ogaan doonaa sababta mamnuuciddii la i saaray?
js_faq_ban_reason_visibility_answer: Haa, ogeysiisyada mamnuuciddii had iyo jeer waxay ku jiraan sababta xadgudubka gaarka ah
js_faq_admin_ban_tools_answer:
Maamulayaashu way awoodaan:
- Inay raadiyaan oo ay mamnuucaan iyagoo isticmaalaya ID/magac/shirkad
- Inay arkaan liiska mamnuucidyada oo leh sababaha
- Inay dib u eegaan racfaannada oo ay wax ka beddelaan mamnuucidyada
admin_faq_intro: Maaree hawlgallada madal, isticmaaleyaasha, iyo dhexdhexaadinta macluumaadka
admin_tip_database_backup: Si joogto ah u dhoofi kaydka xogta si aad u ilaaliso amniga
admin_tip_post_moderation: Had iyo jeer hubi saxnaanta xayeysiiska shaqada ka hor intaadan oggolaan
admin_tip_broadcast_usage: Isticmaal baahinta ogeysiisyada madal ee muhiimka ah
admin_tip_ban_management: Si cad u diiwaan geli sababaha mamnuucida si loola xisaabtamo
admin_faq_panel_overview_ans: Xarun dhexe oo lagu maareeyo madal ay ku jiraan dhexdhexaadinta isticmaalaha/shaqada iyo hawlgallada nidaamka
admin_faq_menu_options_ans: Maaree shaqooyinka, wadaag xayeysiisyada, baahi fariimaha, maaree hawlgallada database-ka, oo arag warbixinnada
admin_faq_job_management_ans: Oggolaan/diid xayeysiisyada, arag faahfaahinta, maaree gelinta aan saxda ahayn
admin_faq_post_sharing: Sidee loo wadaagaa xayeysiisyada la oggolaaday?
admin_faq_post_sharing_ans: Gacanta u gudbi xayeysiisyada la oggolaaday kanaalada/kooxaha
admin_faq_invalid_posts: Sidee loo maareeyaa xayeysiisyada aan saxda ahayn?
admin_faq_invalid_posts_ans: Nidaamku wuxuu ka boodaa xayeysiisyada aan saxda ahayn wuxuuna ogeysiiyaa maamulayaasha si ay dib u eegis ugu sameeyaan
admin_faq_database_options: Waa maxay hawlgallada database-ka ee la heli karo?
admin_faq_database_options_ans: Maaree isticmaaleyaasha/shaqooyinka/jagooyinka banaan/codsiyada, dhoofi xogta, oo samee kayd
admin_faq_data_deletion_ans: Haa - isticmaal 'Masax Xogta' si taxaddar leh (tirtirid joogto ah)
admin_faq_broadcast_feature_ans: U dir fariimo dhammaan isticmaaleyaasha ama kooxo gaar ah ogeysiisyada
admin_faq_ban_process_ans: Dib u eeg racfaannada, arag taariikhda mamnuucidyada, oo wax ka beddel xaaladda mamnuucida
admin_faq_appeal_review_ans: Hubi saxnaanta racfaanka oo cusbooneysii xaaladda mamnuucida si waafaqsan
admin_faq_ban_tools: Waa maxay qalabka maareynta mamnuucida ee jira?
admin_faq_ban_tools_ans: Raadi isticmaaleyaasha, arag liiska mamnuucidyada, oo wax ka beddel xaaladda mamnuucida
contact_admin_intro: Ma u baahan tahay caawimaad? Kooxdayada taageerada ayaa diyaar u ah inay ku caawiyaan. Fadlan dooro qaybta si fiican u sharraxaysa dhibaatadaada.
